title: I Inherited Empire with Fake Pregnancy - Novel Updates
tags: Animal Characteristics   Beastkin   Cultivation   Cute Children   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Elemental Magic   Familial Love   Futuristic Setting   Humanoid Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magical Space   Military   Misunderstandings   Money Grubber   Mpreg   Outer Space   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Shameless Protagonist   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Transported to Another World
author: Lián Yì   连艺
description:
Jin WoWo underwent his heavenly tribulation and was struck by a bolt of lightning into another world. Before he could feel at ease in this new world, he was notified by the Interstellar Legal Education Bureau that…

——He's pregnant!

And he was pregnant with the late marshal’s child, with hundreds of billions of inheritance and an entire energy star waiting for him to inherit.

But… He was still a man! No, a male snail.

What he put in his stomach… No, actually, it was inside his shell. It was…

The Empire’s Marshal Raymond “died” as a martyr, but when he woke up again, he found himself soaked in a pile of warm liquid, with his whole body still intact.

Suddenly, he heard a clear voice coming from the outside: “Yes, this is the child of Marshal Raymond and me!”

Raymond: ???>
